title: 求大神帮我看看crashreport
txt_content:
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Who set us up the TNT?

Time: 14-8-5 上午7:38
Description: Exception in server tick loop

java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: net/minecraft/client/multiplayer/WorldClient
        at net.minecraft.server.management.PlayerManager.<init>(PlayerManager.java:55)
        at net.minecraft.world.WorldServer.<init>(WorldServer.java:203)
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.func_71247_a(MinecraftServer.java:347)
        at net.minecraft.server.dedicated.DedicatedServer.func_71197_b(DedicatedServer.java:225)
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:637)
        at net.minecraft.server.ThreadMinecraftServer.run(SourceFile:583)
Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: net.minecraft.client.multiplayer.WorldClient
        at net.minecraft.launchwrapper.LaunchClassLoader.findClass(LaunchClassLoader.java:186)
        at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
        at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
        ... 6 more
Caused by: java.lang.RuntimeException: Attempted to load class bdd for invalid side SERVER
        at cpw.mods.fml.common.asm.transformers.SideTransformer.transform(SideTransformer.java:51)
        at net.minecraft.launchwrapper.LaunchClassLoader.runTransformers(LaunchClassLoader.java:274)
        at net.minecraft.launchwrapper.LaunchClassLoader.findClass(LaunchClassLoader.java:172)
        ... 8 more


A detailed walkthrough of the error, its code path and all known details is as follows:

replies.author: 北美路人
replies.txt_content: 服务器存档崩溃，把world删了吧

刚才把optifine从服务端拿了出去，然后可以建出世界了现在在不停的刷这个...




QQ截图20140805075548.png (19.87 KB, 下载次数: 0)

2014-8-5 07:58 上传

本帖最后由 10783 于 2014-8-5 08:07 编辑 
熄灭的火把 发表于 2014-8-5 07:53
服务器存档崩溃，把world删了吧
原来回复在这..
多谢了，删了后开出来了，另外问一下optifine就是不用装在服务端么？
